original_title: 純情濡らし、愛情暮らし
overview: An erotic drama about an adolescent girl who grew up in a father-son family and grows up by noticing her father's free love. Tomomi, a high school girl who lost her mother when she was young and lives alone with her father's friend. Friend has been rigorously raising Tomomi with one man while holding multiple part-time jobs without getting a regular job, but Tomomi could not understand his father's feelings and was only repulsing. One day, Tomomi's best friend triggered an incident...
title: Junjô nurashi, aijô kurashi
